name: Iceman-8
description:
Iceman-8 is a very small, cute and quirky game made in the PICO-8 game-engine where the goal is to satisfy your customers by making the most delicious of ice creams! Complete your customer's order and score points! Will you break the high-score? Play now!

How to play

Use the arrow keys to select the correct ice cream flavour!
Press Z to start scooping!
